AI, Diversity, Inclusion Will Take Centre Stage in 2024: Indeed Survey
AI, Diversity, Inclusion Will Take Centre Stage in 2024: Indeed Survey
In light of the recent news by a recent Indeed survey, the workplace is gearing up to adopt artificial intelligence, with a strong focus on diversity and inclusion. The survey revealed that employees are confident in their ability to adapt to AI tools, and employers are planning to implement policies to embrace diversity and inclusion.
Adoption of AI and Meeting Gen Z Expectations
The survey highlighted that both employees and employers are looking towards the adoption of AI tools and meeting the expectations of Gen Z employees. Employees are confident in their ability to adapt to AI, while employers are focused on building workplace strategies tailored to Gen Z.
Focus on Diversity and Inclusion
Employers are showcasing strong intentions to embrace diversity and inclusion policies, with a forthcoming surge in policy adoption. The top three strategies that employers plan to implement include open communication channels, diverse leadership representation, and anti-discrimination reporting.
